contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox NRHP | name = Xavier Chevalier House | nrhp_type = nrhp | image = | caption = | location= Gosier Rd., [[Cape Vincent (town), New York|Cape Vincent, New York]] | lat_degrees = 44 | lat_minutes = 9 | lat_seconds = 29 | lat_direction = N | long_degrees = 76 | long_minutes = 14 | long_seconds = 27 | long_direction = W | coord_display = inline,title | coord_parameters = region:US_type:landmark | locmapin = New York | built = 1852 | architect = Xavier Chevalier | architecture = | added = September 27, 1985 | area = {{convert|53.2|acre}} | governing_body = Private | mpsub = [http://pdfhost.focus.nps.gov/docs/NRHP/Text/64000539.pdf Cape Vincent Town and Village MRA] | refnum = 85002457<ref name="nris">{{NRISref|2009a}}</ref> }} '''Xavier Chevalier House''' is a historic home located at [[Cape Vincent (town), New York|Cape Vincent]] in [[Jefferson County, New York]]. The [[limestone]] farmhouse was built in 1852 and has three sections: a front, gabled, three-bay {{frac|1|1|2}}-story main block; a gabled, 1-story side wing; and a small cinder block [[lean-to]]. Also on the property is a mid-19th-century [[saltbox]] barn and a mid-19th-century limestone [[smokehouse]].<ref name="nrhpinv_ny">{{cite web|url=http://www.oprhp.state.ny.us/hpimaging/hp_view.asp?GroupView=2815|title=National Register of Historic Places Registration: Xavier Chevalier House|date=July 1985|accessdate=2009-12-10 |author=JoAnn Beck|publisher=[[New York State Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation]]}}</ref> It was listed on the [[National Register of Historic Places]] in 1985.<ref name="nris"/> ==References== {{reflist}} {{National Register of Historic Places in New York}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Chevalier, Xavier, House}} [[Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in New York]] [[Category:Houses completed in 1852]] [[Category:Houses in Jefferson County, New York]] {{JeffersonNY-NRHP-stub}}
